name: Leap the Synth
description:
You've been warped into your own video game!
Move to the beat with an amazing Synthwave music soundtrack, squash bugs in your code, and get back to reality!
Everything is moving to the beat: time your movement and use the blue blocks in order to jump and climb to the exit.

The game has been translated in english, italian, french, spanish, portuguese, dutch, german, turkish and russian.
